data.name: STAR OCEAN THE DIVINE FORCE DIGITAL DELUXE UPGRADE
data.detailed_description:
Upgrade from the standard edition of STAR OCEAN THE DIVINE FORCE to the DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION
・Radiant Hildegrim
・Holy Sigrdrifa
・Bunny the Lagomower Brooch
・tri-Emblum
・Gold Bunny Statue
・Andvaranaut's Ring
・STAR OCEAN THE DIVINE FORCE ORIGINAL SOUND TRACK DIGITAL DELUXE EDITION
